ceasn:description.en-us: The Science Georgia Standards of Excellence are designed to provide foundational knowledge and skills for all students to develop proficiency in science. These standards drive instruction. Hands-on, student-centered, and inquiry-based approaches should be the emphasis of instruction. The standards are a required minimum set of expectations that show proficiency in science. However, instruction can extend beyond these minimum expectations to meet student needs. At the same time, these standards set a maximum expectation on what will be assessed by the Georgia Milestones Assessment System.
